'''Blossoming Starlight Discount''' is a [[Discount Event]] in [[Version 3.8]].

==Discount Period==
* 2023-07-05 11:00 UTC+8 - 2023-08-14 03:59:59

==Outfit Details==
* [[Klee]]'s outfit "[[Blossoming Starlight]]" will be permanently available in the [[Shop]] after the [[Version 3.8]] update.
* The price of the outfit after discount is 1,350 [[Genesis Crystal]]s. The price will revert to 1,680 Genesis Crystals after the limited-time discount ends. The outfit can only be purchased once.
* The outfit can be viewed in [[Character]] > [[Dressing Room]] > [[Character Outfit|Outfit]] after purchase.
* Travelers who do not have Klee can still purchase the outfit, which can be viewed in the [[Character Archive]] after purchase.
